weakpoint.destroyed.own: %s destroyed one o’ yer ship’s Weakpoints!

weakpoint.destroyed.all_enemy: All enemy Weakpoints have been destroyed!
item.crab_trap.lore.1: When a Crab walks inta this trap, ye can
item.crab_trap.lore.2: carry it an’ release it wherever ye want.
cannonball.tracer.lore.2: consume any Gunpowder in a Cannon.
cannonball.tracer.lore.4: which be only apparent to its user.
cannonball.normal.lore: Th’ most basic type o’ Cannonball.
cannonball.hot.lore.1: On impact, sets an area around
cannonball.gas.lore.1: On impact, releases a toxic cloud
cannonball.chain.lore.2: by a chain. A little less accurate,
cannonball.chain.lore.3: but it has a wider area o’ effect.
cannonball.bouncy.lore.3: Each time it bounces, it blasts
cannonball.golden.lore.2: Th’ most fancy type o’ Cannonball!
cannonball.golden.lore.3: Cannonballs o’ Gold reward Doubloons to
cannonball.golden.lore.4: their users when they damage ships
cannonball.player.lore.2: shootin’ th’ barrel that yer in.
cannonball.player.lore.3: Deals no damage t’ blocks or pirates.
item.raid_horn.lore.2: give yer entire crew a buff.
item.harpoon.lore.1: Ye can use this weapon to
item.blast_barrel.lore.2: to increase power an’ punch to ignite!
item.gunpowder.lore: Used t’ change th’ power o’ a Cannon shot.
item.rock.lore.4: while ye wait fer th’ game
tutorial.ship_timer.second: Th’ Trainin’ Ship will repair itself in %s second!
tutorial.ship_timer.seconds: Th’ Trainin’ Ship will repair itself in %1$s seconds!
tutorial.description: Here ye can learn about important game mechanics by talkin’ t’ th’ Pirate Teachers at each area an’ tryin’ things out fer yerself!
tutorial.note: (Speak to all 4 Pirate Teachers on this island t’ get rid o’ these notifications.)
chest.skeleton.warn: This be a %1$s! Ye need a %2$s in order to unlock it!
tip.1: If ye want t’ shoot a Cannonball more towards th’ left or right, ye can put unequal amounts o’ Gunpowder inta a Cannon’s Gunpowder slots.
tip.2: In order t’ shoot a Cannonball ye need ’ place Gunpowder in at least one o’ th’ 2 slots on th’ sides o’ th’ Cannon.
tip.3: All Cannonballs have different properties. Make sure t’ read the item lore t’ see what they do.
tip.4: Fire placed by Hot Cannonballs will deal extra damage to a ship once it extinguishes.
tip.5: Ye can regenerate health by bein’ on yer own ship, eatin’ a Golden Apple, or blowin’ a Raid Horn.
tip.6: Clusters o’ Cannonballs be weak against ships, but they’ll kill pirates wit’ ease.
tip.7: Use yer Spottin’ Spyglass t’ locate an’ temporarily expose Weakpoints on th’ scallywag ship.
tip.8: Usin’ an ’arpoon underwater will allow ye t’ perform a quick dash.
tip.9: Ye can use a Skeleton Key to open th’ Team Treasure o’ yer enemies or open Skeleton Treasures.
tip.10: Killin’ a scallywag regenerates a little bit o’ health.
tip.11: Pirates drop a small amount o’ Doubloons on death.
tip.12: If ye die, ye lose all items ye were carryin’ wit’ ye.
tip.13: Share any leftover resources wit’ yer mateys either by droppin’ ’em or puttin’ ’em inta th’ Team Treasure on yer ship.
tip.14: Destroyin’ Weakpoints be th’ best way ta deal a lot o’ damage t’ ships.
tip.15: Ye deal significantly less damage when ye board th’ scallywag ship. Only board th’ scallywag ship if ye intend on raidin’ their Team Treasure.
tip.16: Gas Cannonballs leave a cloud o’ Gas that weakens an’ damages any pirates who get inside it.
tip.17: Bouncy Cannonballs will blow up randomly after bouncin’ around fer a little bit.
tip.18: 10 Gunpowder be a good amount t’ keep in mind if ye want t’ hit th’ hull o’ a ship.
tip.19: Ye can remove Gunpowder from th’ Gunpowder slots o’ a Cannon by punchin’ ’em.
tip.20: Tracer Cannonball shots don’t consume any Gunpowder! Ye can use ’em ta get a rough estimate o’ where yer shot will land.
tip.21: Chain Cannonballs be a little less accurate than the other Cannonball types, but can deal a lot o’ damage to a ship’s sails.
tip.games: (Play %s more games t’ be able to ’ide tips.)
tip.game: (Play %s more game t’ be able to ’ide tips.)
tip.enabled: Ye’ve enabled ingame tips. Ye can disable ’em usin’ yer Lobby Book.
tip.disabled: Ye’ve disabled ingame tips. Ye can re-enable ’em usin’ yer Lobby Book.
tip.cannot_disable.one: Ye cannot do this until ye play 1 more game.
tip.cannot_disable: Ye cannot do this until ye play %s more games.
achievement.bonus_goals.description: Optional objectives that ye can just complete fer fun.
achievement.love_rocks.description: While waitin’ fer th’ game ta start, throw 50 Rocks in one sittin’.
achievement.robbery.description: Unlock the enemy Team Treasure usin’ a Skeleton Key.
achievement.credits.description: Interact wit’ th’ Lobby’s Credit displays.
achievement.cannoneer.description: Use all o’ th’ different Cannonball types ingame. (All time)
achievement.watchtower.description: Talk t’ th’ Pirate Teacher at th’ Watchtower.
achievement.treasure_pit.description: Talk t’ th’ Pirate Teacher at th’ Treasure Pit.
achievement.training_island.description: Learn about th’ game on th’ Trainin’ Island!
achievement.combat_area.description: Talk t’ th’ Pirate Teacher at th’ Combat Area.
achievement.cannon_dock.description: Talk t’ th’ Pirate Teacher at th’ Cannon Dock.
achievement.parrot.description: Pet th’ parrot 50 times in a row...
achievement.planetary_pirates.descriptio: A space helmet an’ a weapon that seems t’ be inspired by Meteor Miner technology. Looks like these pirates want t’ go ta space...
achievement.rocket_riders.description: Just 3 Rocket Riders, flyin’ inta the atmosphere... Sorta...
achievement.easter_egg.description: Ye found all the Easter Eggs!
teacher.weakpoint.1: Welcome t’ th’ Watchtower! Here, ye can learn what Weakpoints be an’ how ta spot ’em.
teacher.weakpoint.2: All pirates carry a Spottin’ Spyglass. But this isn’t just yer ordinary Spyglass: ye can use this one t’ spot special Weakpoints on th’ enemy ship.
teacher.weakpoint.3: While lookin’ through th’ Spottin’ Spyglass, ye’ll notice a subtle white X shape on th’ enemy ship. In order to expose th’ Weakpoint, ye need ta look at the X fer 3 seconds.
teacher.weakpoint.4: Once a Weakpoint be exposed, it will become temporarily visible fer yer entire team. The X shape will turn red an’ then fade t’ white over time, indicatin’ that it’s becomin’ unexposed. Ye can always spot it again t’ re-expose it.
teacher.weakpoint.5: Hittin’ exposed Weakpoints wit’ any Cannonball (besides th’ Pirate an’ Tracer ones) will deal a ton o’ extra damage, so make sure t’ spot those Weakpoints an’ aim yer shots t’ try an’ hit em!
teacher.weakpoint.6: Once ye hit one Weakpoint, th’ next one becomes visible. Keep on spottin’ an’ hittin’ ’em until there be none left!
teacher.weakpoint.7: Note that ye can only spot one Weakpoint at a time in a real game. However, here at th’ Watchtower, ye can see multiple at once just so ye can get a feel fer exposin’ ’em.
teacher.weakpoint.8: Now it’s yer turn. Use yer Spottin’ Spyglass to expose some Weakpoints!
teacher.combat.1: Ahoy, welcome t’ th’ Combat Area! I’m here t’ teach ye about all th’ different weapons in Crafty Cannoneers. Grab some fer yerself from th’ Weapon Rack behind me!
teacher.combat.2: In a real game, pirates be always equipped wit’ a Cutlass an’ a Hand Crossbow. Other weapons can be found in different types o’ Treasure Chests.
teacher.combat.3: Ye can see which type o’ Treasure Chest a weapon can be found in by lookin’ at th’ color o’ its handle.
teacher.combat.4: A blue handle means that th’ weapon can be found in Uncommon Treasure Chests, while a purple handle means it can be found in Rare Treasure Chests.
teacher.combat.5: Each weapon has its own damage an’ attack speed. Some even have some special properties, like th’ Boardin’ Axe an’ the ’arpoon. Read the item descriptions in yer inventory t’ learn more about em!
teacher.combat.6: Th’ Combat Area also has a bunch o’ Trainin’ Dummies! These guys have th’ same health an’ armor stats as any other Pirate. Ye can use ’em t’ practice yer combat skills an’ find yer favorite weapons.
teacher.combat.7: Go ahead, grab yerself some weapons an’ start beatin’ up those Trainin’ Dummies!
teacher.chest.1: Welcome t’ th’ Treasure Pit! Here, ye can learn about Treasure Chests an’ practice lootin’ ’em fer yerself.
teacher.chest.2: There be 4 types o’ Treasure Chests which can be found on th’ small island in th’ middle o’ th’ map. All of ’em contain different items, an’ th’ rarer th’ Treasure is, th’ better loot ye’ll find inside.
teacher.chest.skeleton.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Arrows, Golden Apples, an’ Golden Cannonballs.
teacher.chest.rare.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Blast Barrels, Arrows, Golden Apples, Trooper Tonic, Shields, Rare Weapons, an’ Special Cannonballs.
teacher.chest.uncommon.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Arrows, Golden Apples, Trooper Tonic, Shields, an’ Uncommon Weapons.
teacher.chest.common.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Arrows, and Golden Apples.
teacher.chest.3: It’s good t’ stick around on the island an’ take as much loot from th’ Treasure Chests as possible. But be careful: if ye die, ye lose all the items ye were carryin’ wit’ ye!
teacher.chest.4: Ye can use Doubloons t’ purchase special Cannonballs from th’ Pirate Traders on yer ship.
teacher.chest.5: Go on, start lootin’ some treasure here t’ see what it’s like!
teacher.chest.6: Cargo Barrels spawn around yer ship when th’ Lost Cargo modifier is enabled. These are an easier way t’ grab some extra supplies without needin’ t’ go all th’ way t’ the island. Be careful, some Cargo Barrels are explosive!
teacher.cannon.1: Cannons be th’ main gameplay element o’ Crafty Cannoneers. Ye use ’em t’ destroy the enemy ship or kill scalleywags occupyin’ th’ central island. Here at th’ Cannon Dock, ye can learn how ta become a true cannoneer!
teacher.cannon.2: Cannons have 2 slots on th’ sides. If ye click on these slots wit’ Gunpowder, ye’ll fill up a part o’ th’ slot. Each slot can store up ta 7 Gunpowder.
teacher.cannon.3: Th’ more Gunpowder ye put in th’ Cannon, th’ stronger th’ shot will be. Ye can also use th’ Gunpowder slots to aim yer shot in a given direction by loadin’ more Gunpowder in one slot than the other.
teacher.cannon.4: Once ye’re done loadin’ up Gunpowder, ye can shoot a Cannonball by placin’ it at th’ back o’ th’ Cannon. Th’ Cannon takes a few seconds t’ fire up, an’ then... thar she blows!
teacher.cannon.5: Ye can preview yer shot without losin’ Gunpowder by shootin’ a Tracer Cannonball instead. Tracer Cannonballs leave a green particle trail that only ye can see, an’ ye get ’em back once they hit somethin’. Ye also spawn wit’ ’em!
teacher.cannon.6: There be other special Cannonballs that ye can find in Treasure Chests or buy at yer ship. These have unique properties, so make sure ye read the item descriptions in yer inventory t’ learn about what they do!
teacher.cannon.7: What’re ye waitin’ for? Start shootin’ some Cannons an’ see if ye can hit those Weakpoints!
parkour.left_canceled: Ye left th’ game, so yer Parkour run be canceled.
parkour.personal_best: That’s a new personal best time!
error.parkour: An error has occurred, so th’ Parkour leaderboard has been reset. If ye see this message, %s
error.game: An error has occurred, so th’ game has been reset t’ defaults. If ye see this message, %s
error.discord: Report on th’ Zeronia Discord server
game.seagulls: Fly inta a ring o’ seagulls t’ stop spectatin’!
game.joined.late: %1$s joined the %2$s Team! A late arrival, unfortunately.
game.take_off: Ye can take off yer %s t’ leave th’ game!
game.watch_game: Feel free t’ spectate this game instead.
game.waiting_ready: Waitin’ fer teams t’ ready up...
game.countdown.canceled: Countdown canceled! Both teams need at least 1 pirate.
game.countdown.ten_seconds: Th’ game will begin in 10 seconds!
game.left_spectator: %s be no longer spectatin’ th’ game.
game.spectator_bounds: Unable t’ spectate outside o’ the arena!
game.in_progress: A game be currently in progress!
game.bubble_column: A bubble column blocks yer path...
game.no_players: No pirates remainin’. Th’ previous match has been canceled.
game.mob_warn: This server does not allow hostile mobs ta spawn. Please enable this in server properties before changin’ settings!
easter_egg.parrot.1: Th’ parrot thanks ye fer yer kindness...
easter_egg.parrot.3: Th’ parrot would like ta be yer best friend...
easter_egg.parrot.4: Th’ parrot wishes fer this moment t’ last forever...
customizer.map_owner: %s be in control o’ game settings!
chat.confirm: Please confirm game settings at th’ %s!
chat.new_here: It seems like ye’re new t’ %s.
chat.recommend: We highly recommend ye t’ check out th’ %s before playin’ the actual game!
chat.warp_pad: Ye can go there by usin’ th’ blue warp pad on th’ left side o’ th’ Lobby.
chat.cannot_cancel.second: Cannot cancel th’ match right now. Try again in %s second.
chat.cannot_cancel.seconds: Cannot cancel th’ match right now. Try again in %s seconds.
chat.cannot_cancel.game: Cannot cancel th’ match. A game is already in progress.
chat.cannot_cancel.players: Cannot cancel th’ match. Pirates have already joined teams.
credits.zeronia: Stay up t’ date wit’ our projects!
book.title: Lobby Book
book.welcome.2: A game where 2 teams o' pirates fight t’ get loot an’ destroy each other’s ships usin' their Cannons!
book.how_to_play.1: At th’ start o’ th’ game, pirates must jump off their ships, swim t’ th’ central island, an’ open %1$s t’ find resources an’ weapons. %2$s
book.how_to_play.2: Don’t wait at the island fer too long or ye could die wit’ all yer items!
book.how_to_play.3: Once ye have enough resources, ye can bring ’em back t’ yer ship an’ use ’em t’ buy a variety o’ %1$s. Each one does somethin’ special. %2$s
book.how_to_play.4: Read the item descriptions t’ learn about what they do!
book.how_to_play.5: %1$s have 2 side slots. Put up ta 7 %2$s in these t’ change th’ power an’ angle o’ yer shot. After that, load yer %3$s in th’ middle an’ shoot! %4$s
book.how_to_play.6: Ye can use a %s first t’ preview where yer shot will land!
book.how_to_play.7: Th’ %1$s isn’t just fer show: ye can use it to expose %2$s on the enemy ship! Hittin’ %3$s %4$s wit’ %5$s will deal a lot o’ damage. %6$s
book.how_to_play.8: Try t’ learn how to aim fer ’em usin’ different %1$s an’ %2$s!
lobby.label.tutorial: (a special island used t’ learn about th’ game’s mechanics)
lobby.label.parkour.2: (complete th’ course as fast as possible)
lobby.label.credits.2: (interact wit’ th’ displays t’ read th’ credits)
modifier.no_tracers.description: Removes Tracer Cannonballs from pirate loadouts, forcin’ pirates t’ learn how to aim without ’em.
modifier.wildlife.description: Adds feisty Sharks an’ pesky Crabs t’ th’ map. Sharks lurk th’ waters in search o’ prey, while Crabs roam the island an’ try ta steal yer loot!
modifier.sea_storms.description: Let it rain! In th’ heavy downpour an’ winds, yer Cannonballs will become wildly inaccurate. Beware o’ lightnin’ on th’ central island!
modifier.lost_cargo.description: Barrels o’ loot emerge from th’ waters around yer ship! If ye can’t make it t’ th’ central island, ye’ll still be able to obtain materials somehow. Watch out fer explosive Cargo Traps which spawn along with the other barrels!
modifier.grave_robbery.description: When ye die, a Grave chest spawns at yer death location which contains up ta 5 o’ yer previous items. Ye better loot it quick before somebody else does!
modifier.boat_cannons.description: Th’ boats at th’ central island now have their own Cannons! Load up ta 5 Gunpowder an’ shoot a Cannonball in th’ direction yer boat is pointing.
